name: Warrior Fairy
tooltip_skill: Increase echelon damage by 20% and rate of fire by 10% for 20 seconds in the next battle

name: Fury Fairy
tooltip_skill: Increases echelon accuracy by 50% and crit rate by 25% for 20 seconds in the next battle

name: Armor Fairy
tooltip_skill: Increases SG armor by 50% for 20 seconds in the next battle

name: Shield Fairy
tooltip_skill: Grant SMGs a 150hp shield in the next battle

name: Defense Fairy
tooltip_skill: Reduce the echelon's damage taken by 30% for all battles in a single turn

name: Taunt Fairy
tooltip_aura: Damage +18%, Crit Dmg +25%, Accuracy +58%, Evasion +28%, Armor +8%
tooltip_skill: Deploy a dummy target with 1600hp to take enemy fire in the next battle

name: Sniper Fairy
tooltip_skill: Shoot the enemy unit with the highest max hp for 20000 damage in the next battle. Initial CD: 10s

name: Artillery Fairy
tooltip_skill: Launch a mortar shell dealing 1200 damage to enemies in a 2.5 unit radius in the next battle. Initial CD: 5s

name: Airstrike Fairy
tooltip_skill: Call an airstrike, dealing 500 damage to all enemies in the next battle

name: Reinforcement Fairy
tooltip_skill: Grant the T-doll in the echelon with the lowest % of hp an extra dummy. Increase echelon evaison by 10% for all battles this turn. Lasts for 20 seconds

name: Parachute Fairy
tooltip_skill: Airdrops the current echelon to any helipad within a radius of 3 nodes and decreases damage, accuracy, evasion, armor, and crit rate of the echelon by 40% for two turns

name: Landmine Fairy
tooltip_skill: Set landmines on adjacent empty nodes that deal 50% damage to enemies' current hp if they come into contact with the mines. Does not work against bosses. Mines last 2 turns.

name: Rocket Fairy
tooltip_skill: Deploy a rocket launcher that lasts for 2 turns and has 3 shots, dealing 20% damage of enemies' current hp when an enemy moves within a radius of 2 around it. Does not work on bosses. Friendly fire is possible

name: Construction Fairy
tooltip_aura: Damage +15%, Crit Dmg +20%, Accuracy +50%, Evasion +40%, Armor +10%
tooltip_skill: Construct a fortress on the current node that lasts 3 turns. When fighting on this node, echelon damage, accuracy, evasion, armor, and crit rate are increased by 30%

name: Command Fairy
tooltip_skill: Increase EXP gained by the echelon by 25% for the next battle (does not work in combat sims)

name: Rescue Fairy
tooltip_skill: Increase the chance of obtaining a rare t-doll from the next battle

name: Illumination Fairy
tooltip_skill: Raises visibility by 2 nodes during night battles and increases echelon accuracy by 30% for all battles in 2 turns, lasting 20 seconds in battle

name: Golden Fairy
tooltip_aura: Damage +20%, Crit Dmg +25%, Accuracy +62%, Evasion +50%, Armor +12%
tooltip_skill: Inspiration from fate will fill you with determination

name: Cooking Fairy
tooltip_aura: Damage +10%, Crit Dmg +20%, Accuracy +10%, Evasion +80%, Armor +20%
tooltip_skill: In the next battle, echelon randomly receives one of the following effects: Damage +20%, Rate of Fire +20%, Accuracy +30%, Evasion +25%, Damage -0%

name: Firework Fairy
tooltip_skill: Increase echelon accuracy by 80% for 10 seconds in the next battle

name: Yae Sakura
tooltip_skill: Summons large AOE fire pillars in the enemy area that last for 2 seconds, dealing 120 damage every 0.5 seconds to any enemy within the aoe

name: Kaguya-Hime
tooltip_skill: SKILL NOT YET ADDED

name: Chloe
tooltip_skill: SKILL NOT YET ADDED

name: Suee
tooltip_skill: Scatter flowers on adjacent nodes with no enemies. For two turns, when fighting on those nodes, increase ally damage, crit rate, accuracy, evasion, and armor by 20%. Overrides the fortress node from Construction Fairy

name: Sehra & Nina
tooltip_skill: Increase echelon damage by 20% while decrease enemy accuracy by 10% for 20 seconds in the next battle

name: Preiya & Camilla
tooltip_aura: Damage +22%, Crit Dmg +32%, Accuracy +50%, Evasion +10%, Armor +10%
tooltip_skill: SKILL NOT YET ADDED

name: Nian
tooltip_skill: Light a firecracker, stunning the target enemy for 2 seconds and dealing 50 damage every 1 second for 5 seconds to enemies within a radius of 4 units

name: Anna Graem
tooltip_skill: Increase evasion of allies on the frontline by 30% while decreasing their damage by 20%. Increase damage of all other allies by 20% but decrease evasion by 30%. Lasts 20 seconds.
